avoid having logic here.
pls decide what kind of targetTab we need on the caller method,.

@teosarca then I would leave it as default in the builder to SAME_TAB unless set different and make sure whenever opentarget.gridview is used the targetTab gets passed as targettab.same_tab_overlay. WDYT?
pls set the target tab too
